videos.headline: Pitt's Darrin Hall shakes defender for TD
videos.description: Darrin Hall navigates his way five yards to the end zone to put Pittsburgh up on Georgia Tech 14-0.

videos.headline: Ollison takes handoff 8 yards for the score
videos.description: Qadree Ollison gets his second touchdown after taking the hand-off for an eight yard score.

videos.headline: TaQuon Marshall gets Georgia Tech's first TD of game
videos.description: TaQuon Marshall dives in for the 1-yard touchdown to give Georgia Tech its first score of the game.

videos.headline: Trick play ends in disaster for Pitt
videos.description: Pittsburgh's Kenny Pickett has his pass intercepted after attempting a trick play, leading to a 42-yard return for Georgia Tech's Malik Rivera.

videos.headline: Georgia Tech's Marshall runs for 2nd TD of game
videos.description: TaQuon Marshall navigates his way seven yards through the Pittsburgh defense to pick up his second rushing touchdown of the game.
